overview: A home security representative shows up at a client's house for a consultation, but Krissy and her husband end up consulting him into a three-way. John and Dana get Mark to come over and fix their car, with a job well done they offer him a reward. It was like nothing he could have thought of. Natasha and Will are celebrating her birthday over a nice meal. Will then goes on by staying that she can have whatever she wants. India is a clinically diagnosed Nymphomaniac. For her Birthday she turns down a modified kitchen and even a big diamond for her wedding ring.
title: DP Lust
